In Hinduism, the caste system is a complex social structure that divides people into different groups based on their birth. The caste system is often associated with religious and cultural practices. In contrast, people born in lower castes are often seen as less religious and may not practice religious rituals as frequently.

In the case of the two individuals at the cafe, it is possible that one of them may have been from a higher caste than the other.
